## Multiple Dispatch

``` {julia}
function multiply(a,b)
    return a*b
end
```

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply(1,1)
```

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply(1., 1.)
```

## Avoid allocation

``` {julia}
@code_llvm multiply([1.], [1.])
```

### Mutated function

``` {julia}
function multiply!(s, a,b, i)
    s[i] = a[i] * b[i]
    return s
end
```


``` {julia}
s = zeros(1)
a = [1.]
b = [1.];

@btime multiply(a[1], b[1])
@btime multiply!(s, a, b, 1)
```
